weekOf: January 29 to February 5th (Not live until ~5am EDT on January 29th)
introMessages: Clock in and work as a Firefighter, Forklift Operator, or deliver a Paper Route in three new Odd Jobs, arriving in GTA Online tomorrow.

All Odd Jobs are paying out double through February 4, alongside additional rewards for earning an honest living, such as a tripled Weekly Challenge paycheck and the returning Downtown Cab Co. Revere Collar Shirt.
Cocaine Production Speeds are also doubled, as are prize purses for competing in the Community Race Series, and more.

Prepare for an explosive Valentine’s Day and get ready to blow opposing couples up in the new Deadline Duet adversary mode and take a ride on the wild side in the Pfister Astrale (Sports Classic), both releasing in GTA Online next week.

We recently introduced several bug fixes and improvements to GTA Online, including updates to Wanted Level Options in the Mission Creator — allowing for greater flexibility to create a full range of GTA mission styles. For more information, visit the latest Title Update notes.
prizeRideChallenge: Place Top 4 in the LS Car Meet Series
premiumRace: Down the Drain, locked to Muscle
hswTimeTrial: Del Perro Beach to Murietta Heights
weeklyChallenge: Complete 5 Pizza Deliveries to receive the Pizza This Tee and GTA$300,000
bonuses: 2X GTA$ and RP - Taxi Work (GTA$ only)
2X GTA$ and RP - RC Time Trials
2X GTA$ and RP - Featured Series: Issi Classic Races
2X GTA$ and RP - Community Race Series
2X GTA$ and RP - Cocaine Production Speed
